name: Track Construction
shortDescription: A modern construction project management web app built with Next.js and MongoDB that enables teams to manage projects, specifications, roles, comments, and file previews with real-time collaboration, role-based access, and optional AI-powered generation.

name: Clinic Management
shortDescription: A multi-tier Windows Forms clinic management desktop application built in C# that supports role-based authentication, appointment scheduling, patient records, doctor management, and reporting, using Entity Framework and SQL Server as part of an academic project at College LaSalle.

name: Lci Database Manager
shortDescription: A simple and efficient interface for managing SQL databases. Easily run queries, edit tables, and view data in a clean, user-friendly environment. Designed for convenience, it streamlines essential database tasks without unnecessary complexity. (MongoDB count your days)

name: Vehicle Management System
shortDescription: The Vehicle Management System is a C# console application designed to demonstrate Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts, including inheritance, exception handling, file operations, sorting algorithms, and logical problem-solving.

name: Python Terminal Game
shortDescription: A Pacman-like game written in Python using the Curses library for the terminal environment.

name: Factoid Project
shortDescription: This factoid answering program is designed to answer questions based on the text that both follow a certain template
